General.Name: YanTai Yuancheng Gold Co Ltd
General.Description: YanTai Yuancheng Gold Co., Ltd. engages in the steel products, coal, and fuel oil businesses primarily in China. The company engages in the sale of coal and building products; real estate development and operation; property management; project contracting and construction; sale of building decoration materials, steel products, electromechanical equipment, gold, and mineral products; house leasing; and foreign investment activities. YanTai Yuancheng Gold Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Yantai, China.
